title: Welcome to Websets
content:
Source: https://docs.exa.ai/websets/overview Our goal is to help you find anything you want on the web, no matter how complex. You can use Websets in two ways: 1. Through our intuitive Dashboard interface - perfect for quickly finding what you need without any coding 2. Via our powerful API - ideal for programmatic access and integration into your workflow Dashboard} icon="bolt-lightning" href="./dashboard">
Use Websets through our Dashboard.
 API} icon="magnifying-glass" href="./api">
Use Websets programatically through our API.
